name: Dear My Friend
description:
My Dear Friend is a pixel adventure/puzzle game. The protagonist Lin accidentally encountered the mysterious girl Yep and was drew to a strange world and forced to find the "Truth".
The world keeps shifting, but the story stays the same.
This is a tale about the growth of all life.
We'd like to present our game in the name of life, growth and friendship.
Feature
Exquisite ArtworkMoving original tunesMultiple lines of story (will implemented in the complete game)Every character is unique. Well, that's all for now.
We only release the prelude of the game, there are a lot of gameplay still under development.
